ing: 5 cups water, or more if needed
des: "For those who don't like pork. This has a nice smoked flavor when you use a smoked turkey leg."
ins: Combine the split peas, water, smoked turkey legs, chicken broth, carrot, celery, potatoes, onion, garlic powder, oregano, and bay leaves in a slow cooker. Cover, set the cooker to High, and cook until the peas are tender and the soup is thickened, 4 to 5 hours. Discard bay leaves to serve.
